page.title: 16Tytherington-New Housing.
page.content: A large programme of house building is taking place between Manchester and the Bollin Valley in Tytherington. The buildings include bungalows, semi-detached houses and detached houses,with varying numbers of bedrooms. Nearby,a golf course is being constructed close to the site of Tytherington Old Hall. The Hall was threatened by demolition,but it has been preserved for the present. The golf course will be the first 18-hole course in Macclesfield(there is already a 9-hole course).It will have to compete with Prestbury's famous 18-hole course. Tytherington,it seems,will become an even larger residential area and include more recreational facilities which,at present,are rather limited.
